title: Hunting knife

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Hunting knife is obtained as a reward from the 2016 Halloween event, as well as subsequent Halloween events. Running while having the knife equipped uses a different animation.

content:
This article is about the holiday item. For the item used during the Misthalin Mystery quest, see Killer's knife.
Hunting knife

Item ID20779

The Hunting knife is obtained as a reward from the 2016 Halloween event, as well as subsequent Halloween events. Running while having the knife equipped uses a different animation.

Despite being a knife, its combat styles are the same as those of a warhammer. It offers very large attack penalties and is nearly useless as an actual weapon. As such it is allowed during "fun weapon" fights in the Duel Arena.

When wielded, a "Slash" option will appear on other players. Picking this option will cause the player to hit the other player. The hit is just an animation and no damage is dealt, nor does it count as entering combat. You also have a chance to miss with the knife and have it drop to the floor, and the message You drop your hunting knife on the floor! will appear in the chatbox.

This item can be stored in the toy box of a costume room, as part of the 2016: Masked killer set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • A player slashes another player with a Hunting knife.

  • A player running while wielding the hunting knife.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The animation for slashing another player is identical to the one used when cutting jungle plants with a machete.
  • The examine text is a reference to the theme song of Mr Stabby, a short flash animation series created by Jonti Picking.

[[File:Hunting knife detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''Hunting knife''' is obtained as a reward from the [[2016 Halloween event]], as well as subsequent Halloween events. Running while having the knife equipped uses a different animation.

Despite being a knife, its combat styles are the same as those of a [[warhammer]]. It offers very large attack penalties and is nearly useless as an actual weapon. As such it is allowed during "fun weapon" fights in the [[Duel Arena]].

When wielded, a "Slash" option will appear on other players. Picking this option will cause the player to hit the other player. The hit is just an animation and no damage is dealt, nor does it count as entering combat. You also have a chance to miss with the knife and have it drop to the floor, and the message ''You drop your hunting knife on the floor!'' will appear in the chatbox.
